resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f8-841c-433e-26a3-92a82c24d483#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Albrech Dürer: Miksa császár portréja, 1519, Bécs, Kunsthistorisches Museum, 74x62 cm, olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Albrech Dürer:Portrait Of Emperor Miksa , 1519, Wien, Kunsthistorisches Museum, 74x62 cm, oil, canvas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrech Dürer:Portrait des Kaisers Miksa, 1519, 
Wien, Kunsthistorisches Museum, 74x62 Zentimeter, Öl, Segeltuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrech Dürer:Portrait d'empereur Miksa, 1519, 
Wien, musée de Kunsthistorisches, 74x62 centimètre, huile, toile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrech Dürer:Portrait do emperor Miksa, 1519, 
Wien, museu de Kunsthistorisches, 74x62 cm, óleo, lona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrech Dürer:ritratto dell'imperatore Miksa, 
1519, Wien, museo di Kunsthistorisches, 74x62 centimetro, olio, tela 
di canapa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Albrech Dόrer:Portrait του αυτοκράτορα Miksa, 
1519, Wien, Kunsthistorisches μουσείο, 74x62 εκατ., 
πετρέλαιο, καμβάς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrech Dürer:Portrait del emperador Miksa, 1519,
Wien, museo de Kunsthistorisches, 74x62 centímetro, aceite, lona</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A császár félprofilos mellképe prémes köpenyben fekete kalapban, zöld háttér előtt, kezében gránátalma, felette felirat és címer.</string>
            <string language="en">The Emperor On a Semi-Profile Half-Lenght Portrait, In a Furred Cloak In a Black Hat, Against A Green Background, Grenade Apple In His Hand, Inscription And Crest Above Him</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Dürer,  16. század,  portré,  Reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">Dürer, 16th Century, Portrait, Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kaiser auf einem Halb-Profil Hälfte-Lenght 
Portrait, in einem Furred Mantel in einem schwarzen Hut, gegen einen 
grünen Hintergrund, eine Granate Apple in seiner Hand, eine 
Beschreibung und einen Scheitel über ihm</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'empereur sur une verticale de Moitié-Lenght de
semi-finale-profile, dans un manteau Poilu dans un chapeau noir, 
contre un fond, une grenade Apple dans sa main, une inscription et une
crête verts au-dessus de lui</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O emperor em um retrato da Metade-Lenght do 
Semi-Perfil, em um casaco de Furred em um chapéu preto, de encontro a
um fundo, a um grenade Apple em sua mão, a um inscription e a uma 
crista verdes acima dele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'imperatore su un Ritratto di Metà-Lenght di
Semi-Profilo, in un mantello di Furred in un cappello nero, contro una
priorità bassa, una granata Apple in sua mano, un'iscrizione e una 
cresta verdi sopra lui</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αυτοκράτορας σε ένα πορτρέτο μισό- Lenght 
ημι-σχεδιαγράμματος, σε έναν μαλλιαρό επενδύτη σε ένα μαύρο 
καπέλο, σε ένα πράσινο κλίμα, το μήλο χειροβομβίδων στο χέρι 
του, την επιγραφή και την CREST επάνω από τον</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El emperador en un retrato de la Mitad-Lenght del 
Semi-Perfil, en un capote de Furred en un sombrero negro, contra un 
fondo, una granada Apple en su mano, una inscripción y una cresta 
verdes sobre él</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dürer, 16. Jahrhundert, Portrait, Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dürer, 16ème Siècle, Verticale, La Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dürer, 1õ Século, Retrato, Renascimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dürer, Sedicesimo Secolo, Ritratto, Rinascita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Dόrer, 16$ος αιώνας, πορτρέτο, αναγέννηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dürer, Décimosexto Siglo, Retrato, Renacimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

      </lom>
